articles.author: Jesse Coghlan
articles.title: ‘South Park’ rips into Trump’s crypto ties in latest episode - Cointelegraph
articles.description: South Park took aim at US President Trump’s ties to crypto in its latest episode, showing Trump taking gifts, including Bitcoin, from tech executives.
articles.content:
The animated comedy series South Park mocked US President Donald Trump in its latest episode aired on Wednesday, satirizing his ties to crypto.
The episode titled Sickofancy depicted scenes showing … [+3117 chars]
